lender.name: Tu L
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lender.name: C.J. Buenischke
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing is the way to independence. Why do banks have the biggest, fanciest buildings in every major city of the world? Why do we bail them out when get into financial trouble? Why do their top employees continue to make millions? Kiva is a way to bypass this system.

lender.name: The Wetzel Family
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We are starting our own little farm and plan to add dairy goats, laying hens, pigs, more fruit trees, bigger vegetable gardens, edible landscaping, honeybees....

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: If you are in a position to help others you have a moral obligation to do it.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed, and I want to share.

lender.name: Ulf_L_A
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: waltman6
lender.loan_because: we are able.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It helps at a very personal level. I've given 2 loans to women who run beauty shops, just like my single mom did when I was growing up. It is a very tangible way to give back a little of what I have received in life.
lender.occupational_info: I keep our computer networks running and safe from hackers.

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to follow their dreams.

lender.name: maia
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to contribute, and it makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office at a music school.

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Dan & Nelda
lender.loan_because: Its just another way to live out our faith! We really believe we're blessed to be a blessing! Besides, it brings us great joy!
lender.occupational_info: Dan works in the production of electricity. I work in the legal field.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.occupation: Former Sociology prof, writer and student of life.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to support small business owners around the world, especially those whose work is food-related, because I hope to start my own food business someday.

lender.name: Loren
lender.loan_because: Luke 12:48- "To whom much is given, much will be required."

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to get started!
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business too - and appreciated the loans others gave me.

lender.name: Jill Weinberg Pfeiffer
lender.occupation: Nonprofit Development Director/ Artist on the side
lender.loan_because: it helps to create justice. Part of creating peace and balance in this world is doing our part to make sure as many people as possible have their basic needs covered. While this is certainly not an original statement, in my heart, it is an important one.
lender.occupational_info: In simplest terms, I raise money for an agency that provides programs for families, such as after school care, ESL classes, and a food pantry.

lender.name: Lori & Bob
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are striving to improve their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Lori is a children's writer and Bob works for a vitamin and supplement company.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: it is a small way to make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: i am studying international public health at the University of Sydney

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with veterinarians to keep animals healthy, assist in surgeries and run the financial aspect of the business.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: A family may benifit and be able to help their neighbors

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I can, and therefor, I should

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I need the karma.
lender.occupational_info: I make commercials.

lender.name: Francy
lender.loan_because: Helping others in need is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to set a good example for my kids. I want to show them that one's profits needn't only be counted in money.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: The Bible says that we should help rescue the poor. By loaning I pray that the recipients might be rescued both in the short term and long term.
lender.occupational_info: I help leaders develop their gifts and abilities so they can accomplish their dreams.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I am so incredibly blessed--the whole world deserves to live well and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I make the programs that help computers do what they do. I also write books to entertain and do artwork to make my soul feel filled. I do martial arts to make my body healthy.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Years ago there were people who believed in me and made the life I have now possible. I have a strong connection to other women who are struggling to improve their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I care for pet cats and dogs.

lender.name: Rachel and Siggi
lender.loan_because: It's important to pay it forward.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: we all have needed a helping hand at some point in our lives. It is a privilege to now be able to extend that hand on to another.
lender.occupational_info: I offer medical care to women, helping them to stay healthy throughout their lives, including the extra-special time of childbirth.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I am a ride operator at Disneyland in Southern California.

lender.name: Renee
lender.occupational_info: I try to help farmers grow food and other products using less pesticides. I like to donate to the agricultural businesses.

lender.name: dennis
lender.loan_because: i know that i can earn more if i have the money to buy old cars then fix it then sell it.
lender.occupational_info: im a mechanic im having of it cause this is what i love to do...

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: In honor of my friend Stephen on his 50th birthday since he cherishes people around the world.

lender.name: Emmanual
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live better.

lender.name: Thom
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: everyone just needs a friend to achieve what they want to do. For the gift of Freedom, we are obligated to assist others in achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Providing the tools needed by others to be more successful in their work. Teaching, training in HR, Leadership and communications

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Michelle and John
lender.loan_because: It's important to give to the world community
lender.occupational_info: John helps to design aircraft engines. Michelle is a nurse on a busy maternity unit

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: it's something tangible I can do to help those in need.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to help themselves benefits all of us.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with disabilities learn to be more independent.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Aleksander
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and our school is very active in helping people in the community.

lender.name: Lucinda
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Head Start, a government program which provides a comprehensive pre-school experience for low-income families in the United States.

lender.name: Robert & Ruth
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward

lender.name: Blueyedkaren
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that such a small donation on my part can be used to make such a difference to others. The cumulative donations of everyone giving to Kiva are working to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I publish Homes & Land Magazine in Prescott and Sedona Arizona.

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: Energy Efficiency

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it
lender.occupational_info: I help design and support computer systems for an oil company in the Middle East

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: the Internet has made it possible for individuals to make global changes, and I want to be part of the change.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: everyone can do something.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and sell products to help people feel better. I sell to large and small pharmacies.

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: No one has ever become poor by giving. -Anne Frank
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.name: Ady & Pablo
lender.loan_because: We believe that entrepreneurs are very important members of every community. And we believe in the amazing energy created when you share your blessings. Viva el Per!

lender.name: Byron Woolley
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand sometime.

lender.name: Tomoko
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva and thought it's a really great system to help each other. I've lived in Chile & I am interested in help people in developing country.
lender.occupational_info: I just started , so I will describe later.

lender.name: Gayen
lender.loan_because: Loaning to others is a way of giving a hand of friendship
lender.occupational_info: I was a Rural Mail Carrier delivering mail to rural communities in Iowa, USA

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: I can & it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Robert and Bambi
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives and wish to share that with others.

lender.name: NW Dee
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: My day job helps me fund what I truly love to do and that is all things photography, taking pictures of our world, people and places.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It is a small but effective way to help someone get ahead. I have lived in Eastern Europe and admire the work ethic and family devotion I have witnessed there.
lender.occupational_info: I do various things - part time librarian, part time consultant, world traveler etc.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: It helps people less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: Operate spacecraft and make sure they don't break, or damage something else.

lender.name: itaru
lender.occupation: retired and waiting for going to paradise
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i live in a small town in japan.and now, i feel to become a member of global community thanks to kiva's network

lender.name: Yoko
lender.loan_because: I love positive people.

lender.name: julia
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me a gift certificate for Christmas, and I was excited to be able to help someone across the world in such a simple and direct way. What a great idea. Thank you, Kiva for making this work.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrant children who have moved to America from a variety of different countries.

lender.name: Jeannene Langford
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a unique gift to offer the world. Through my KIva loans I hope to create an opportunity for others to develop their "gifts".
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. It's as simple as hoping to make the world more beautiful as well as inspire creativity. I create art and develop product for companies world wide. I work with manufacturers that license the rights to use my art for their products. I develop art for everything from greeting cards, table top, craft products to wall art. Please check out my blog for what I am working on currently. www.jeannenelangford.com/blog

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to have a "Do Good." impact on the world around me.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businessmen and non-profit organizations market themselves in cost-effective methods, with a particular focus on online marketing.

lender.name: Darren & Jeannene
lender.occupation: Plumber self employed & Qantas Airways Sales
lender.loan_because: We would like to try and make a difference in the world for someone less fortunate and who is prepared to help themselves. We are very privledged to travel the world and have seen some struggling families.
lender.occupational_info: Darren is a hard working self employed plumber so understands the difficulties associated with starting and staying in business. Jeannene works in sales for Qantas Airways. We both love travel and animals.

lender.name: Felicity
lender.loan_because: I love women entrepreneurs, probably because I can relate to them. I am very inspired by these women. They remind me what I am doing working to support my family. Working because thats what people do.
lender.occupational_info: I love the creativity and adventure of business.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so abundantly that I want to be able to bless others. I also like the concept of teaching others to fish, rather than just giving them a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I'm privilaged to take care of three of the most awesome blessings I have ever received in my life every day. My children are an inspiration & a joy.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I need to put up money to build my own photocopier and food business near schools in our area
lender.occupational_info: I got axed recently after our account collapsed but i see tremendous potential in putting up my own photocopier and food business.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Successful entrepreneurs make the world a better place.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a very good initiative

lender.name: Koji
lender.loan_because: I wanna do something for someone else who wanna change their lives.

lender.name: Phil and Debbie
lender.loan_because: We simply believe in being part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: Phil is a sheriff deputy, which is a police officer. Debbie is a trauma counselor and basically helps kids who have been abused and adults who have been victims of crime to recover emotionally from what happened.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I am able to, and because I believe better access to banking and loans will enable people in the developing world to shape their own future.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed, and I want to share those blessing with others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage warehouse inventories and transportation for 10 national distribution centers across the United States.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: People becoming successful by helping themselves is inspiring.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a cook at a spiritual retreat.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: we have too much stuff and they need such a small amount

lender.name: Charlotte & Claus
lender.loan_because: We wish to make the world a better place by giving a hand to people with good initiatives

lender.name: priscilla
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I have taught young children for 32 years and provided workshops for parents in poverty areas in New York City.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to live in a country where our standard of living is taken for granted and we tend to forget others around us
lender.occupational_info: I design and build roads, water systems, and sanitary sewer systems.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people change.

lender.name: jukka
lender.loan_because: All should be given equal opportunities
lender.occupational_info: Nerd

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: this is a Christmas present in honor of Judy, Paul, Mark, and Carol, my sister, brother, and their spouses.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school-grades 6-8-and help students with their academic, social, and personal needs.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupation: jack of all trades, master of none

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I was bored

lender.name: Avadax
lender.loan_because: I'm a happy dog and like to help people.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can and want to support women all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Education and Consulting

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Preventing accidents.

lender.name: Pepper, Michelle, Nicole
lender.loan_because: We lend to help others who are willing to work to get ahead. Much has been given to us and we want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Nicole is an 11year old student. Michelle and Pepper are the Chef owners of a Catering Company.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I want humans to be successful and support one another.
lender.occupational_info: I'd be Queen but the title is taken.

lender.name: Yukie
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Perry
lender.loan_because: I am doing well in my life right now just like a perfect sunset...I want to leave the world a little better than I found it...

lender.name: Familia/Amigos del Ligre
lender.loan_because: Estos microcrditos son posibles gracias al apoyo de mi familia y amigos. Os lo agradezco otra vez aqu. Todo este dinero ser empleado algn da (espero no muy lejano) en un proyecto propio. Mientras tanto, este dinero esta mejor aqu que en el banco.
lender.occupational_info: Mi principal ocupacin empieza despus del trabajo. Cuando salgo de la oficina (y a veces mientras estoy en ella) investigo, imagino y pongo en prctica pequeos proyectos con la intencin de dejar el mundo mejor de como lo encontr.

lender.name: Ordinary Life
lender.loan_because: Our group is very fortunate and also generous. As a result we sponsor a number of efforts to help those in need around the world.
lender.occupational_info: A class at St. Paul's United Methodist Church in Houston, Texas. We seek to enhance our experience of ourselves, of others and the life we live.

lender.name: Bram, Tom, Sonja en Ed
lender.loan_because: we want to help other people

lender.name: stu henderson
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Canadian and American history to University students.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Lending helps my endorphin flow...

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can. Helping your neighbour leaves this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical health care to animals.

lender.name: Chip
lender.loan_because: What I have does not belong to just me. It has been given to my care and if others need it more than I do, I am obliged to share it with them.
lender.occupational_info: Work and pray to alleviate extreme poverty.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: I think people in poorer countries need it more than I do. We are lucky to live in Canada.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful family and the ability to run my own business for over 25 years. I hope these loans help others reach their own level of success.
lender.occupational_info: Our company manufactures document security paper products including medical prescription paper products.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: As one of my favorite quotes says, What you get, give. What you learn, teach. Pass it on. (Dr. Maya Angelou)
lender.occupational_info: I work with children with autism and similar disabilities to help them learn the things they will need to know to live as full a life as possible.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: Because I had loans in the past and now I am in a position to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Broker, helping people sell and purchase homes and business'.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are a good way for those of us with the ability to reach out, personally, to those who need a hand. Positive action to positive people via positive management.
lender.occupational_info:
A retired solder I know the cost of keeping peace and the cost of war.
Making small loans to people in order to give them a way to advance I feel that I am participating in a way to really help people worldwide. A way that lets them know others care.
You CAN do something to better this planet, one person at a time, over and over!
A way to fight poverty, terrorism and unrest , all at once.

lender.name: Nicky
lender.loan_because: Help those we can.
lender.occupational_info: Own Business.

lender.name: Hadas
lender.occupational_info: I gather client needs, analyze them and design a software system that would fit their needs (using available resources from the company I work for).

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I have money that I can share. It's fascinating to see it go round and round in a giving loop.

lender.name: Jaakko
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is a fascinating tool: I very much like it that my contributions can help build capacity for people to help themselves and do this many times through reinvestment.
lender.occupational_info: International development.

lender.name: A Friend
lender.loan_because: It's important to give back to your community. By helping people who are trying to make a difference, I can extend my local community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach families.

lender.name: Miran
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Greg
lender.occupational_info: Analyst

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: My Grandmother gives us (my cousins, siblings, and I) money, usually 25 dollars, each Christmas to donate to a charity of our choice. We give a presentation to the family on Christmas day at dinner. This year, and a couple of years before, I chose Kiva as charity to give the 25 dollars to. So far, I have donated to 9 people/groups in about 5 years.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grade 9 student, I like to curl, and play golf. My favourite subject at school are science and math. I do not like running at all. It's my least favourite thing to do during school, and anywhere else.

lender.name: Spence
lender.loan_because: My life's dreams have come true with the help of my friends and my family. I hope to help others achieve their dreams as well.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Over time people have invested in me and helped me thrive. Now I have the chance to help others thrive.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help up instead of hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and land.

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because:
Change has to come from someone, somewhere, at some point...
"There is nothing more powerful that an idea whose time has come." -Victor Hugo
lender.occupational_info: Making a small contribution in hopes that it will go a long way.

lender.name: Kristen and Pam
lender.loan_because: We believe in women's access to health services as well as encouraging their viability as business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Pam helps people sell and purchase homes. Kristen is preparing to enter college as a music teacher.

lender.name: Mary Louise
lender.loan_because: It is an efficient and productive way to share the blessings I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: Empowerment of clients through the accession of information in all forms of media.

lender.name: Aina
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: venkatesh
lender.loan_because: As a Global Citizen its my duty make a difference in bringing the world out of poverty. This is a great way and gives me Soul satisfaction
lender.occupational_info: I am information technology professional who has come from a country where i have first hand experience of going through poverty and daily struggle

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I support programs that educate the public about health and education issues and encourage them to take action.

lender.name: Rolland
lender.loan_because: I want to share the wealth

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to need financial assistance and I would like to do my bit to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain HP Australia's online store. I'm responsible for keeping the product information, prices and images up to date and for setting up online promotions in the store.

lender.name: Armando
lender.occupation: in honor of mother Sharon, retired counselor

lender.name: Kayran
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed within my own life. I want to share some of my blessings with others. I love the idea of being available to support and help people who are so vibrant and determined to enhance their own, and their families, lives.

lender.name: Trish Oleary
lender.loan_because: My passion in life is to help others. I truly believe that God puts certain people and/or companies in our path for a reason and it is our duty as Gods children to help each no matter gender or race.
lender.occupational_info: I work at home on the internet. I help people live a healthy life and teach them on how to improve their financial life as well.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: My son told me about this great cause so I asked for it as my Christmas gift . I like the idea of people working to help themselves and not just accepting charity. Plus I know the full amount will be going directly to the person in need. I also like the idea of choosing a friend in another country to help.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a business. Before that I worked as a secretary in education, in a public school system. We are very blessed in our life and with our famliy. It is nice to be able to reach out to others in need.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: a)It's time to see the big picture b)Put my money where my mouth is. c)With a few clicks of the mouse, really make a positive difference in somebody's life half-way around the world. d) Be a positive force in the world. e) To help out.
lender.occupational_info: I play the drums. I have a lot of fun playing music locally here in the Pacific Northwest. I get paid to play jazz, salsa, and some rock music. I make most of my living playing music, but I do have a part time day job to help ends meet. You know, it really was time to stop thinking about my self. I have to thank Kiva for providing that possibility!

lender.name: AJN
lender.loan_because: I can. In a world where so much wealth is bestowed upon so few, I want to do my part to help balance the scales. I want to help.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I was in business for myself and I know the satisfaction of of running your own business
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired, but I owned my own retail jewelry business.

lender.name: karolyn
lender.loan_because: What happens to a dream deferred? --Langston Hughes

lender.name: H&K
lender.loan_because: We are truly blessed in our lives and want to share our blessings with others. Loaning allows us to help others with dignity, by allowing them to help themselves.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: micro-finance allows the remarkable opportunity for some-one like me in a developed nation to join with others to empower an entrepreneur in another art of the world. A simple and elegant idea making an amazing difference!
lender.occupational_info: Co-ordinate and manage a large pharmacy and staff responsible for provision of medications to residents in Aged Care Facilities

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because:
I want to help make this world a better place for my daughter and the other children of this world.
I also like that even though I don't have a lot of money to give right now I can still make a difference with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing one of the most important jobs in this world. I am raising a little girl so that she can grow to be a strong, confident and wise woman some day.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupation: Post Doc Researcher, University of Birmingham, UK

lender.name: Lon
lender.loan_because: I have too much not to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm mandated to create good...

lender.name: Deana and Dave
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of lighting many candles to light the way for all. Our small investment will be very powerful!
lender.occupational_info: We help people succeed in our business by directing and guiding them and working along side with them.

lender.name: DIANE
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help that you feel you really make a contribution and see the results in someone's life.

lender.name: Bobbi Jo and Matt
lender.loan_because: When God is doing something great in the world, join in!
lender.occupational_info: Bobbi Jo teaches 21 children in second grade. She teaches them math, science, and social studies. Matt makes machine parts for oil companies.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: I believe you should "be the change you want to see in the world".

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have beem blessed with limitless opportunities, and I feel compelled to help others who may not be as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate medical care for ill/injured people on behalf of insurance companies.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: i am able to

lender.name: John Aggerholm
lender.loan_because: I believe this approach can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Works as an Consultant in the Pharma Industry

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Why not? Everyone deserves an opportunity to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I edit books, making sure that the text is spelled correctly, is grammatically correct, and is in logical order.

lender.name: Liisa
lender.loan_because: I feel so much better knowing that my money is out there working by helping someone fund their business and feed their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in the operating room at the hospital.

lender.name: suzan
lender.loan_because: with kiva partners, i can actually help support a small business owner live with dignity while they work to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: my passion is creating color and light.

lender.name: Barry & Laura
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: because I can................ I may not be able to do much but I can do something!
lender.occupational_info: I have been a part of the education world for 45 years....

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: Because I love to do things to help others. I am a Christian and God says we should help others when we can!

lender.name: Teak
lender.loan_because: Me gwine help everyone, man.

lender.name: Sue
lender.occupation: dog trainer, management consultant, art quilter

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a home with very little money, and now that I am grown and have a stable income, I feel it is a privilege and responsibility to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, managing the money that our business essentially loans to other businesses that buy our products

lender.name: Dan Scheall
lender.loan_because: A compassionate KIVA "loan" is an investment in mankind. Seems if our children and grandchildren are to inherit this troubled planet, we are serving their interests as well.
lender.occupational_info: I can see the end of the road now, Getting older now...so I am engaged in "catch-up", having lost a lot of time in self indulgence. The concept of lending and re-lending in perpetuity to persons of need can change the world.

lender.name: Vidar
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people should have a reasonable opportunity to live a good life based on their income, and without hunger, suffering and exploitation.

lender.name: Melanie Silvia
lender.loan_because: I'm enjoying it!

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference with other business owners in different parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are entreprenuers and have been involved in building several types of businesses from the ground up!

lender.name: Smith
lender.loan_because: We appreciate the help others have given to help us open and run our healing arts center.
lender.occupational_info: We have a clinic where doctors and therapists practice natural healing methods.

lender.name: Brian & Amanda
lender.loan_because: We believe the way to reduce poverty in the world is through democracy and capitalism. We support people who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Brian manages the computer systems for a large bank across Asia and the Pacific. Amanda runs a small business.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Visitor Services, White Mountain National Forest

lender.name: Cheryll
lender.loan_because: I loan because no matter how difficult life is in Canada, we remain one of the most privileged groups of people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English literature to teenagers in a vocational school.

lender.name: Kim-Thu & LJ
lender.loan_because: there is great value in helping others help themselves.

lender.name: Cece
lender.occupational_info: I partner with individuals to guide and hold their dream alive to fruition.

lender.name: jo & jb
lender.loan_because: we hope that one day all those in need will have the tools to live comfortable and fulfilling lives...
lender.occupational_info: we both work in health care.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: What does a kiva loan contract look like?

lender.name: Fran and Ken
lender.loan_because: We believe grass roots development empowers people

lender.name: Eric & Cassy
lender.loan_because: It is a gift to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: We both help people discover their own minds.

lender.name: koji miura
lender.loan_because: I approve KIVAs philosophy & system
lender.occupational_info: auditor of consulting f irm

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Provide care for people who are ill.

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: $25.00 can go a long way to making some dreams into reality.
lender.occupational_info: I help young children learn to think for themselves and be responsible.

lender.name: CruiseCompete.com
lender.occupation: Where agents compete to offer the best cruise deal
lender.loan_because: Greater economic efficiency is always possible through better information, greater cooperation, and innovative ideas.
lender.occupational_info: We operate a marketplace where consumers can select a cruise & receive competing offers from independent, discount travel agencies. Customers compare offers, then contact agents via phone or e-mail to ask questions or to book.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I wish help others who seek to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: it's fun...
lender.occupational_info: a jack-of-all-loans...

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I feel that this is just one small thing I can do to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Managing numbers and relationships.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the power of the individual and the will we all pocess to improve our situation in life.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It is better to help.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate in this country; I want to make a difference in someone's life. The well-being of one affects us all. Sustainable economic development will help contribute to a peaceful world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach businesses and other organizations how to be successful while not hurting nature and while helping people.

lender.name: buleocean2012
lender.loan_because: Thanks to NOVA/PBS channel who brought KIVA to everyone. We were really amazed by the originator of KIVA by helping others in third world country. We always wanted to help people, who needs financially help. This is the perfect opportunity to take an advantage through KIVA to help others. Who knows, we could be living in third world country trying to feed my family with no opportunity in site but KIVA has changed that and I hope it continues to do good work. We need organization like KIVA that can support others around the world. Wishing good things for people will bring true joy in your life...
lender.occupational_info: I'm an electrical engineer working on hardware, software and communication systems.

lender.name: Connor
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at University of Notre Dame.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Doing the right thing to help others is the best way to celebrate being human! We look after others by giving them tools to help themselves be stronger as that leads to knowledge and power that will end civil unrest.
lender.occupational_info: Hi-Tech worker

lender.name: Aly
lender.loan_because: I have traveled in Africa and want to give back in any way I can to such wonderful people.
lender.occupational_info: Raising two boys

lender.name: Garry and Sharon
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help people make their ideas happen.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed
lender.occupational_info: I work for a dentist and clean patients teeth, take x-rays to check for cavities and give instructions on taking care of your teeth and mouth.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: People need a hand in becoming self-sufficient and small businesses are the backbone of any economy.

lender.name: uzoma
lender.loan_because: i want to produce more casava in large quntity to sell as commercial purposes and also to feed my sblings.
lender.occupational_info: farming work which required mechanical skill and finance to produce cassava

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I believe that everyone should have a chance at opportunity. If we teach people to fish for themselves with a little help from us we have taken one more family out of poverty.
There's nothing better for your soul than giving from the heart.
I also have a greater faith in humanity after seeing the amount of loans made each day by people of every Faith, Color, and Nationality. Makes me proud to be a part of this Kiva movement.
lender.occupational_info: Transportation Engineering and Coaching various sports in my free time.

lender.name: Mitchell and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be in a position to help others as much as we can.
lender.occupational_info: Mitchell is a teacher and Jennifer is a nurse.

lender.name: Dawd Siraj
lender.loan_because: Happines comes from sharing. with a little heart, we can change the life of a generation.

lender.name: Maren
lender.loan_because:
One who is gracious to a poor man lends to the Lord, And He will repay him for his good deed.--Proverbs 19:17
"The King will answer and say to them, 'Truly I say to you, to the extent that you did it to one of these brothers of Mine, even the least of them, you did it to Me.'--Matthew 25:40
A righteous man has regard for the life of his animal...--Proverbs 12:10
lender.occupational_info: I'm a veterinary student with a masters degree in biology. I especially wish to support sustainable agriculture and veterinary projects.

lender.name: Huma
lender.loan_because: Its easy for lazy ones like me, while kiva does all the work!! thanks folks, you are doing great!
